reviews.review: кс го сраная конченная игра просто все тиммейты руинеры
Muito bom, jogo muito competitivo que necessita da habilidade do jogador para evoluir, não é pay to win
Toxicity, hackers, you name it, it's in here. and it' bull shit...
Melhor jogo que já joguei na minha vida! muito bom para jogar com os amigo e ter experiencias novas!
game's still good after so many years, and so are the hackers

Да, сейчас стало сложнее с поднятием рангов... Не знаю, с чем это связано, но не хочу это связывать с WH и AIM программами. Печально, конечно, что такие игроки всё ещё встречаются. Но, как говорится: " не там чисто , где убирают, а там, где не мусорят".

P.S. 
700 hours of game, big star rank. 

Every game against 1 or 2 Wall hackers /aim cheaters.
Even S1mple could take some lessons from these guys.
Dont even try to get higher. Better go to faceit to play.
Conquista mas o jogo e brabo
Fantastic competitive game. Great for anyone looking for a serious, skill based experience.
Jogo das antigas muito bom!!!! Recomendo a todos que querem jogar um jogo de tiro realmente muito bom!!!!
a pretty satisfying sequel to the famous counter strike series... very enjoyable!!!!!
It's a really fun competitive game!
This game is good sometimes makes me mad but good.
Классная игра, правда физика стрельбы не особо классная
jogo sensacional recomendo, so poderia ter um ant cheat melhor

101% a love-hate relationship

This is one of my favorite games.

gooood game but so many freaking hackers
É um otimo jogo para quem procura um FPS, muito semelhante a jogos concorrentes. Muito legal, Valve caprichaa <3
Epic game. Decent community. Was better before f2p. Would recommend 7/10.

Very fun game to play with friends
This game has a very steep learning curve, but once you get to learn it you will love it! Best when played with friends.
